data.text: @ULHospitals @CommHealthMW @PublicHealthMW Mental health of some patients, especially those in for more than a few days, is at rock bottom at this stage. In isolation with no visitors because of contacting covid in the hospital. Out of isolation for a few days. Back in isolation because of a major outbreak.

@ULHospitals @CommHealthMW @PublicHealthMW Hardly surprising with the amount of over crowding, ambulances stuck outside with patients, elderly spending 24 plus hours waiting on a chair, flu vaccines aren't free for everyone :,(

The only exceptions to the visiting restrictions are:
Parents visiting children
People assisting confused patients (e.g. dementia) (on a case-by-case basis)
People visiting patients who are critically unwell or at end of life (on a case-by-case basis)
One person per patient
